羂羂羂

羂字的基本解释

羂
juàn
张网捕捉（野兽）：“但观罗之所羂结。”
绳套：“以革索为羂，策马掷人，多有中者。”

羂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［juàn］
［《廣韻》古縣切，去霰，見。］
［《廣韻》姑泫切，上銑，見。］
“絹2”的被通假字。亦作“羂1”。
(1)捕取鸟兽的网。
(2)用绳索绊取。
(3)缠绕。

羂字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【网字部】　羂； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页950第03
【廣韻】姑泫切【集韻】【正韻】古泫切，?音畎。【玉篇】與罥同。又罔張獸。【司馬相如·上林賦】羂騕褭。【註】罥，係取也。【張衡·西京賦】但觀罝羅之所羂結。【註】羂，縊也。　又與絹通。【周禮·秋官·翨氏註】置其所食之物於絹中。　又【正韻】吉泫切，音狷。義同。

羂字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
羂字的起名意思

暂无。

羂
Basic explanation of words
羂
juàn
Zhang Wang captures (the beast): "But Guanluo's all is tied up."
Noose: "Take the leather rope as a sling, ride a horse and throw a man, and there are many in the middle."
羂
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［juàn］
["Guangyun" Guxian cut, go to Cha, see you. ]
["Guangyun" Gu Xun cut, milled up, see you. ]
"Silk 2" was passed falsely. Also known as "羂1".
(1) A net for catching birds and beasts.
(2) Tripped with a rope.
(3) Winding.
羂
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Net Word Department] 　羂; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 950 No. 03
[Guang Yun] Gu Xuan cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Gu Xuan cut,? Yin Dian. 【Jade articles】Same as Wu. Zhang Beast again. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】Yan Jiao. [Note] You, take it. 【Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu】Dan Guan Zhuo Zhi Suo knot. [Note] Hang, hang also.　Connect with silk again. 【Zhou Li·Qiuguan·Yinshi Note】Place what he eats in the silk.　[Zheng Yun] Ji Xuan cut, sound 狷. The same meaning.
羂
